column3: For reference, it is currently impossible to hit meaningfully the following message types in the fuzzer: `if (msg_type == NetMsgType::VERSION) {`, `if (msg_type == NetMsgType::WTXIDRELAY) {`. See https://marcofalke.github.io/btc_cov/fuzz.coverage/src/net_processing.cpp.gcov.html
Thanks for the ping! Will review :)
I'll explore some ideas on how to increase coverage even further. Closing for now.
